statements: DELETE FROM energy_data WHERE storage_unit_id = 2 AND production > 100;
DELETE FROM energy_data WHERE production > 100 AND timestamp < '2022-03-01';
DELETE FROM energy_data WHERE consumption < 50 OR storage_unit_id = 3;
DELETE FROM storage_units WHERE storage_id = 10 AND production_data < 100;
DELETE FROM energy_production WHERE storage_unit_id = 1 AND production_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM energy_consumption WHERE consumption_amount > 1000 AND storage_unit_id = 2
DELETE FROM battery WHERE technology = 'lithium ion';
